Generation IX.Scarlet: This Pokémon creates a mud ball by mixing sand and dirt with psychic energy. It treasures its mud ball more than its own life.
Generation IX.Violet: It rolls its mud ball around while the energy it needs for evolution matures. Eventually the time comes for it to evolve.

Generation IX.Scarlet: West Province: Asado Desert Tera Raid Battles ( 1★ )
Generation IX.Violet: West Province: Asado Desert Tera Raid Battles ( 1★ )
